message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $130. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I think the product is quite valuable, but I am only able to pay up to $100. I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but $100 is too low for me. Would you consider $115? It's a fair price for a product this valuable.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I can't go above $110. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
